lead_paragraph: Chris Archer was so excited to pitch for the United States at the World Baseball Classic that he offered to recruit more players to join him.

headline.print_headline: Scherzer, Posey, McCutchen Commit to Play for US at WBC
headline.main: Scherzer, Posey, McCutchen Commit to Play for US at WBC
